name: Crystal Centipede
damage_resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
senses: Darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 20

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: (3/day) If the centipede fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.description: The centipede has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Crystal Carapace
abilities.description: The centipede's body is covered in a crystalline shell, giving it resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.

legendary_actions.name: Leg Swipe (Costs 1 Action)
legendary_actions.description: The centipede makes a leg attack.

legendary_actions.name: Crystal Spikes (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The centipede shoots a volley of crystal spikes at a point it can see within 60 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Burrow (Costs 1 Action)
legendary_actions.description: The centipede burrows into the ground, becoming invisible until it emerges or attacks. While burrowed, the centipede can move 30 feet

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The centipede makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its legs.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is also restrained. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Legs
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Crystal Shards
actions.description: (Recharge 5-6) The centipede shatters some of the crystals on its body, sending razor-sharp shards flying in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 110 (20d10) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
